Title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Writer: Stanley Kubrick, Terry Southern, Peter George
Actors: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden
Plot: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. 14 wins & 11 nominations total
